Pre-Game Insights: Lebanon lost to China in their first match of the Piala Asia 2024. China managed to hold a clean sheet against Lebanon, while Lebanon lost 3-0 to Qatar in their first game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Lebanon and China can be watched live on iNews TV and Vision+ on January 17, 2024, at 18.30 WIB.
Others: Lebanon and China have not met in the final stages of the Asian Cup. Their last encounter was in the qualifiers for the 2011 Asian Cup, where China won both games against Lebanon.Lebanon's lineup for the match against China may be without Walid Shour, who suffered an injury in their first game. Hasan Srour or Jihad Ayoub could potentially replace him.China's lineup is expected to remain unchanged. Wu Lei and Tan Long are likely to be key players for China, while Zhang Linpeng is expected to captain the team.The head-to-head record between Lebanon and China shows that China has a better record against Lebanon, with two wins in their last five meetings.Their last meeting was in a friendly match in 2008, where China drew 0-0 with Lebanon.
